faq.cancel_policy: You can cancel up to 24h in advance for free.
faq.pricing: Pricing depends on your city and space size. Your summary updates as you add details.
faq.reschedule: You can reschedule up to 24h before the visit without fees.
faq.refund: Refunds apply if a visit is canceled before the cutoff or quality falls below our guarantee.
faq.coverage: We currently cover major metro areas; share your ZIP to confirm availability.
